item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

compiled your yell and players code the ::players code is messed up

for example…
clearQuestInt6erface();
and its missing a bracket

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
                        sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
                                        + " players!");                                     
                       
                        clearQuestInterface();
                        sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
                                        + "):", 13589);
                        int line = 13591;
                        for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
                                client playa = getClient(i);
                                if (!validClient(i))
                                        continue;
                                if (playa.playerName != null) {
                                        String title = "";
                                        if (playa.playerRights == 0) {
                                                title = "Regular, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 4) {
                                                title = "Regular, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
                                                title = "Mod, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
                                                title = "Admin, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 0) {
                                                title = "Player, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 3) {
                                                title = "Owner, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 0 && donator >= 1) {
                                                title = "Donator, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 1 && donator >= 1) {
                                                title = "Mod/Donator, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 2 && donator >= 1) {
                                                title = "Admin/Donator, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerRights == 3 && donator >= 1) {
                                                title = "Owner/Donator, ";
                                                   } else if (playa.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Toxic Nation")) {
                                                title = "@blu@GFX Boss@bla, ";
                                        } else if (playa.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Robert")) {
                                                title = "@gre@Head Admin@bla, ";
                                                        }
                                        title += "level-" + playa.combatLevel;
                                        String extra = "";
                                        if (playerRights > 0) {
                                                extra = "(" + playa.playerId + ") ";
                                        }
                                        sendQuest("@dre@" + extra + playa.playerName + "@dbl@ ("
                                                        + title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
                                                        + playa.absY, line);
                                        line++;
                                }                       
                        showInterface(13585);
                        flushOutStream();

                }
	}

item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:18, topic:392273”][code=java]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
+ " players!”);

		clearQuestInt6erface();
		sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
				+ "):", 13589);
		int line = 13591;
		for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
			client playa = getClient(i);
			if (!validClient(i))
				continue;
			if (playa.playerName != null) {
				String title = "";
				if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
					title = "Mod, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
					title = "Admin, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 0) {
					title = "Player, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 3) {
					title = "Owner, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 0 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Donator, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 1 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Mod, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 2 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Admin/Donator, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 3 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Owner, ";
				} else if (playa.playerName
						.equalsIgnoreCase("Toxic Nation")) {
					title = "GFX Boss ";
				} else if (playa.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Robert")) {
					title = "Head Admin ";
				}
				title += "level-" + playa.combatLevel;
				String extra = "";
				if (playerRights > 0) {
					extra = "(" + playa.playerId + ") ";
				}
				sendQuest("@dre@" + extra + playa.playerName + "@dbl@ ("
						+ title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
						+ playa.absY, line);
				line++;
			}
		}
		showInterface(13585);
		flushOutStream();
	}

[/code]

[code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5
&& playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

		if (playerRights == 1) {

		}

			titles = "@gre@[Head Admin]@bla@ ";
		}
		yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
	}

[/code][/quote]

item.title: [Delta] 100 Errors help please! [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

[code]public String playerStaff(){
String staffType = “NONE”;
switch(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]){
case 1405://Mystic Air Staff
case 1381://Staff of Air
case 1397://Air Battlestaff
case 6914://Master Wand
staffType = “AIR”;
break;

	case 1403://Mystic Water Staff
	case 1383://Staff of Water
	case 1395://Water Battlestaff
		staffType = "WATER";
	break;
	
	case 1401://Mystic Fire Staff
	case 1387://Staff of Fire
	case 1393://Fire Battlestaff
		staffType = "FIRE";
	break;
    
	case 1407://Mystic Earth Staff
	case 1385://Staff of Earth
	case 1399://Earth Battlestaff
		staffType = "EARTH";
	break;

}
return staffType;

}

public boolean playerHasItem(int itemID, int amt) {
	if(itemID == 557 && playerStaff().equals("EARTH")) return true;
	if(itemID == 556 && playerStaff().equals("AIR")) return true;
	if(itemID == 555 && playerStaff().equals("WATER")) return true;
	if(itemID == 554 && playerStaff().equals("FIRE")) return true;
	itemID++;
	int found = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
		if (playerItems[i] == itemID) {
			if (playerItemsN[i] >= amt)
				return true;
			else
				found++;
		}
	}
	if (found >= amt)
		return true;
	return false;

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] 100 Errors help please! [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

		if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
			sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
					+ " players!");

			clearQuestInt6erface();
			sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
					+ "):", 13589);
			int line = 13591;
			for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
				client playa = getClient(i);
				if (!validClient(i))
					continue;
				if (playa.playerName != null) {
					String title = "";
					if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
						title = "Mod, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
						title = "Admin, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 0) {
						title = "Player, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 3) {
						title = "Owner, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 0 && donator >= 1) {
						title = "Donator, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 1 && donator >= 1) {
						title = "Mod, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 2 && donator >= 1) {
						title = "Admin/Donator, ";
					} else if (playa.playerRights == 3 && donator >= 1) {
						title = "Owner, ";
					} else if (playa.playerName
							.equalsIgnoreCase("Toxic Nation")) {
						title = "GFX Boss ";
					} else if (playa.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Robert")) {
						title = "Head Admin ";
					}
					title += "level-" + playa.combatLevel;
					String extra = "";
					if (playerRights > 0) {
						extra = "(" + playa.playerId + ") ";
					}
					sendQuest("@dre@" + extra + playa.playerName + "@dbl@ ("
							+ title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
							+ playa.absY, line);
					line++;
				}
			}
			showInterface(13585);
			flushOutStream();
		}
		if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5
				&& playerRights >= 0) {
			String titles = "";

			if (playerRights == 1) {
				titles = "@yel@[Moderator]@bla@ ";
			}
			if (playerRights == 2) {
				titles = "@whi@[Admin]@bla ";
			}
			if (playerRights == 3) {
				titles = "@red@[Owner]@bla@ ";
			}
			if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
				titles = "@blu@[Donator]@bla@ ";
			}
			if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
				titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
			}
			if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
				titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]@bla@ ";
			}
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Toxic Nation")) {
				titles = "@blu@[GFX Boss]@bla@ ";
			}
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Robert")) {
				titles = "@gre@[Head Admin]@bla@ ";
			}
			yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
		}

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {

if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = “[Regular]”;
}

item.title: [Delta] 100 Errors help please! [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Regular]"; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "@yel@[Moderator]@bla@"; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "@blu@[Extreme Donator]@bla@"; } if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) { titles = "@blu@[Premium Donator]@bla@"; } if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) { titles = "@whi@[Administrator]@bla@"; } if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) { titles = "@red@[Owner]@bla@ "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Toxic Nation")) { titles = "@blu@[GFX Boss]@bla@ "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Robert")) { titles = "@gre@[Head Admin]@bla@, "; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

I also edited this:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
+ " players!”);

		clearQuestInt6erface();
		sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
				+ "):", 13589);
		int line = 13591;
		for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
			client playa = getClient(i);
			if (!validClient(i))
				continue;
			if (playa.playerName != null) {
				String title = "";
				if (playa.playerRights == 0) {
					title = "Regular, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 4) {
					title = "Regular, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
					title = "Mod, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
					title = "Admin, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 0) {
					title = "Player, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 3) {
					title = "Owner, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 0 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Donator, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 1 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Mod/Donator, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 2 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Admin/Donator, ";
				} else if (playa.playerRights == 3 && donator >= 1) {
					title = "Owner/Donator, ";
			                   } else if (playa.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Toxic Nation")) {
					title = "@blu@GFX Boss@bla, ";
				} else if (playa.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Robert")) {
					title = "@gre@Head Admin@bla, ";
            					}
				title += "level-" + playa.combatLevel;
				String extra = "";
				if (playerRights > 0) {
					extra = "(" + playa.playerId + ") ";
				}
				sendQuest("@dre@" + extra + playa.playerName + "@dbl@ ("
						+ title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
						+ playa.absY, line);
				line++;
			}			
		showInterface(13585);
		flushOutStream();

	}[/code[/code]
